meanings.sent1: She renormalizes her daily routine after a long vacation.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic renormalizes the engine to its original settings.
meanings.sent3: After the chaos of the party, she renormalizes the living room.
meanings.sent4: His calming presence renormalizes the tense atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The fresh coat of paint renormalizes the appearance of the old house.

meanings.definition: Adjust or modify to bring back to a normal state.
meanings.sent1: He renormalizes the temperature in the room to make it comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The therapist renormalizes the patient's thought patterns through cognitive behavioral therapy.
meanings.sent3: The chef renormalizes the recipe to suit the dietary restrictions of the customer.
meanings.sent4: The rain renormalizes the dry soil, bringing life back to the garden.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise renormalizes the body's metabolism and energy levels.
